title: Infallible
description: A man's daughter is kidnapped and he is forced to comply with their every whim. But will he be able to commit the most mortal of sins?  An Italian Carabinieri officer finds a dead man in the wreckage of a dirigible. He must not only find the man's murderer, but soon finds himself caught in the middle of something much more sinister.   Another gripping thriller from Alex Parker, Infallible will leave you speechless and begging for more.
author: Alex  Parker
